summary: A letter from Fordham Law Professor Bruce A. Green to Judge Richard M. Berman clarifying that Green was not counsel in any Epstein-related case, but had served as an expert witness in support of Alan Dershowitz's motion to disqualify David Boies in the defamation case Giuffre v. Dershowitz. The letter addresses a misunderstanding from a prior court hearing.

keyFacts: Bruce A. Green clarifies he was never counsel to Jeffrey Epstein, his estate, or anyone in an Epstein-related case.
Green served as an expert witness (via expert declaration) in support of Alan Dershowitz's motion to disqualify David Boies in the defamation case Giuffre v. Dershowitz.
The letter addresses a misunderstanding from an August 27, 2019 court hearing where Judge Berman and David Boies suggested Green had undisclosed involvement as counsel in an Epstein-related case.
The underlying case referenced is United States v. Epstein (1:19-cr-00490-RMB), indicating this correspondence is part of the federal criminal proceedings against Epstein.
